author: ozeigermann
msg: - Fixed logging to uninitialized logger - thanks to Martin Holz

- Enables setting of a logger configured on top level in the slide tag in Domain.xml. It was not set before as an initial logger had already been set to org.apache.slide.util.logger.SimpleLogger in selfInit.

author: ozeigermann
msg: Fixed deadlock problem with isolation level higher than read committed.
Was due to global connection not freeing locks.
Removed global connection and have a connection for every request outside a transaction.

author: ozeigermann
msg: Added unique constraint to URI_STRING in table URI - thanks to Martin Holz

author: ozeigermann
msg: Made announcement less striking, but a bit less ugly
